parameters.name: X-Fc-Account-Id
parameters.description: The ID of your Alibaba Cloud account.

parameters.name: X-Fc-Date
parameters.description: The time when the function is invoked. The value is in the **EEE,d MMM yyyy HH:mm:ss GMT** format.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The details of the resource from which you want to remove tags.
